### Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(Stat2Data)
data("Hawks")
```


## 1. Visualisation

### 1 (Q1)

```{r}
hawksSmall<-drop_na(select(Hawks,Age,Day,Month,Year,CaptureTime,Species,Wing,Weight,Tail))
dim(hawksSmall)
head(hawksSmall,5)
```

### 1 (Q2)

```{r}
univar_plot1<-ggplot(data=hawksSmall,aes(x=Weight))+xlab("Weight")
univar_plot1+geom_histogram(binwidth = 10)+ylab("Count")
```
